title: Update README.md add missing opening backtick
author: eddelbuettel

comments.body: PS: Dont worry about the failed build job - it got cancelled to save minutes since this is just a readme change.
Good point. I could have added a `[ci skip]` for a purely cosmetic commit.  Then again, that's more of a maintainer call so all good.
@eddelbuettel absolutely not your fault, its just the greedy runner that ignores nothing :) thanks once again!
